data.name: Techblox
data.detailed_description:
Use blocks and components to create monster trucks with guns, jet-powered tanks, and sci-fi hovercraft with laser weaponry! Bring them online and drive them in a variety of game modes ranging from Arena PVP, racing and special events.


Watch player vehicles get smashed, rammed, and blown apart in a super satisfying block by block destruction system! Every time a part or block is destroyed, it affects your creation's weight distribution, aerodynamics and even functionality loss.


Techblox will offer a variety of Battle Arena style game modes where vehicles with all kinds of real-world and futuristic weaponry can battle it out. APCs, Tanks, hovercraft, and fliers can battle it out on land and in the sky. The physics in Techblox combined with a powerful destruction system and server-side physics will allow for powerful physics-based weaponry like anti-gravity guns and grappling hooks as well as non-weapon based destruction game modes.


Gokarts, Offroaders, Monster Trucks, F1 cars, hovercraft, and aircraft, on tarmac, dirt, grass, or in the air. Do you build a vehicle that is focused on handling and balance or pure adrenaline-pumping muscle power? Will you go super light for pure acceleration, or add some rigid steel into your chassis for some toughness in collisions?

SPECIAL EVENTS
We’ll run frequent special events such as Rocket-powered car soccer, Bulldozer king of the hill, F1 destruction derby, and autonomous robot obstacle courses. They will rotate at various dates and players will test their building skills by taking part in these special game modes.


Everything in Techblox is created with blocks. Even the environments and gameplay logic are all created with blocks. The World Editor allows you to create your own environments with lighting and different atmospheres. Gameplay and logic blocks allow you to add gameplay and UI including scoring. We will host the best user-created games on our live servers and plan to work towards allowing you to self publish your own content.

data.short_description: The ultimate free-to-play online build-em-up! Create awesome drivable vehicles and take them online in multiplayer battles, races and special events. Use weapons against other players, race against other vehicles and watch your creations explode with a satisfying block by block destruction system.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8.1 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 3250 3.5 GHz or Intel Pentium G4560 3.5 GHz / AMD FX-4350 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 2GB or GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: System Windows® 7 / Windows® 8.1 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Processor Intel® Core™ i5 2400 3.4 GHz or i5 7400 3.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen R5 1600X 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 4GB or GTX 1060 6GB / AMD R9 390 8GB Memory 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
